name: Reaper
summary:
STORY:
Death has always been her enemy.

After the death of their parents, she was left with only her sister as family. However, she is young and has a weak body. Her sister, though previously very healthy, somehow got something worse than her. She couldn't understand what the doctors said, but she understood that she must do everything she can to help her sister.

When Death comes to claim the only one she has left, she wasn't just going to sit quietly and let it happen.

ABOUT THE GAME
Play as a young girl attempting to rescue her sister from Death.

This game is team NeriAl's entry for the RPG Maker VX Ace Lite Cook Off. It was made in about two weeks using RPG Maker VX Ace Lite, the limited version of the engine.

Features:
Short story (20-something-minutes, if you don't get lost)
Semi-puzzle things
A mansion-like area to explore
No battle system
Minion-slaying (Not your minions. :p)

Credits:
Eerie BGM & The Tea Garden (Aaron Krogh)
Mistake the Getaway (Kevin MacLeod)
loop-mysterio (McFarland BEATS)
Failed Scream SFX (missozzy of freesound.org)
Other Sound FX (soundjay & freesound.org)
